field.name: expireDate
field.description: Expire Date

field.name: authRequired
field.description: Added this flag for checking the authentication needed or not for accessing the website's content. By default it is empty.

field.name: defaultPackagingType
field.description: Default packaging type

field.name: requestTitle
field.description: title of the initial request url

field.name: referrerTitle
field.description: title of the initial referrer url

field.name: orderFacilityId
field.description: This field contains sensitive information, thus encrypted.

field.name: returnedExcessIssuedQty
field.description: This field holds the quantity which is returned from quantity split or edit traveler quantity if there is excess issuances after split or editing traveler quantity.

field.name: partyTaxId
field.description: This field contains sensitive information, thus encrypted.

field.name: connectSoapUrl
field.description: UPS Soap Connection URL

field.name: defaultPackagingType
field.description: Default packaging type

field.name: routingNumber
field.description: This field contains sensitive information, thus encrypted.

field.name: accountNumber
field.description: This field contains sensitive information, thus encrypted.

field.name: productCategoryUrlName
field.description: Category name to be used in URL on store front

field.name: catalogUrlMountPoint
field.description: Catalog Url mount point to be used

field.name: restockingFeePercentage
field.description: Restocking fee percentage

field.name: capturePmntsOnOrdApproval
field.description: Flag to identify if order payments have to be captured when order is added to CSV with value Y or N

field.name: termTypeId
field.description: Order for products of store will be placed with defined term type.

field.name: autoSetFacility
field.description: Mainly used to control nearest facility work flow

field.name: enableExternalPromotion
field.description: Flag to identify if the external promotions are enabled for the store.

field.name: daysToReturn
field.description: Indicates number of days till order can be returned

field.name: restockingFeeFixed
field.description: Indicates Fee charged for Restocking.

field.name: autoAcceptReturn
field.description: Flag to identify if the return will be accepted automatically.

field.name: productIdentifierEnumId
field.description: Product identifier to identify unique product

field.name: enablePreOrderAutoReleasing
field.description: Flag to enable/disable auto preorder releasing on particular store/brand.

field.name: enableBrokering
field.description: Flag to enable/disable brokering on particular store/brand.

field.name: storeLogoImageUrl
field.description: Image path for display brand specific logo

field.name: requireRefTransaction
field.description: Indicates reference transaction is required or not if yes needs to be enabled on merchant paypal account

field.name: paymentAction
field.description: Payment Method

field.name: listPrice
field.description: Purchase Cost

field.name: TI
field.description: The number of cases per layer in a pallet of the supplier

field.name: HI
field.description: The number of layers of cases in a pallet of the supplier

field.name: productUrlName
field.description: Product name to be used in URL on store front

field.name: xSmallImageUrl
field.description: Extra small image URL for product

field.name: thumbnailImageUrl
field.description: Thumbnail image URL for product

field.name: alwaysNewLineItem
field.description: If Y then the product will be added in the cart as a new line item even if it is already present in the cart.

field.name: isInstallationProduct
field.description: Set Y if product is installable.

field.name: requireInspection
field.description: Set Y if product require inspection.By default product requires inspection

field.name: lastIndexedDateTime
field.description: Last date time when the product get indexed

field.name: geoId
field.description: Add geoId field to Identify country by client ip address

field.name: pdf
field.description: Pdf support available, when set to 1 represents available

field.name: quicktime
field.description: Media Players video/quicktime support available, when set to 1 represents available

field.name: realplayer
field.description: audio/x-pn-realaudio-plugin support available, when set to 1 represents available

field.name: wma
field.description: application/x-mplayer2 support available, when set to 1 represents available

field.name: xdirector
field.description: application/x-director support available, when set to 1 represents available

field.name: flash
field.description: application/x-shockwave-flash support available, when set to 1 represents available

field.name: javaEnabled
field.description: application/x-java-vm support available, when set to 1 represents available

field.name: gears
field.description: application/x-googlegears support available, when set to 1 represents available

field.name: silverlight
field.description: application/x-silverlight support available, when set to 1 represents available

field.name: initialRequestTitle
field.description: title of the initial request url

field.name: browserVersion
field.description: Store full browser build version of User Agent

field.name: cpuArchitecture
field.description: Stores CPU Architecture of User Agent

field.name: browserEngineVersion
field.description: Store browser engine build version of User Agent

field.name: engineName
field.description: Stores name of the browser engine

field.name: isDefault
field.description: If Y then it is default WebSite

field.name: hostedPathAlias
field.description: For WebSites hosted on web apps using the WebSiteFilter, indicates the path this WebSite will be hosted on

field.name: displayMaintenancePage
field.description: If set to Y, redirect user to site maintenance page

field.name: webPageOptimization
field.description: If set to Y, use custom page rendering for Product, Category, Home

field.name: webSiteTypeId
field.description: Deprecated: Please don't use this. Defines website type

field.name: salesChannel
field.description: Defines sales channel of website

field.name: sequenceNum
field.description: Added this field in order to get the Terms in a specified order.

field.name: sequenceNum
field.description: Added this field in order to get the Terms in a specified order.

field.name: sequenceNum
field.description: Added this field in invoice to get the Terms in a specified order.

field.name: parentTypeId
field.description: This will act as parent product price type Id.

field.name: allowPickup
field.description: Turn on/off pickup at Facility level

field.name: computedLastInventoryCount
field.description: This field represents computed last inventory count (availableToPromiseTotal - minimumStock) of a product at a certain point of time if availableToPromiseTotal <= minimumStock it will set as 0

field.name: permissionEnumId
field.description: It will be used to set permission to access content.

field.name: authRequired
field.description: Added this flag for checking the authentication needed or not for accessing the content via WebSitePathAlias.

entity.description: Defines the association of products with parties.
Defines the type of party product.
Product Data imported through csv will be stored in this entity

field.name: statusUserLoginId
field.description: The userLoginId of the user changing the voucher status

field.name: merchantId
field.description: Merchant Id

field.name: token
field.description: Token

field.name: jsSecurityKey
field.description: JS Security Key

field.name: apiKey
field.description: API Key

field.name: apiSecret
field.description: API Secret

field.name: transactionUrl
field.description: Transaction URL Sandbox or Live

field.name: enableDataVault
field.description: Enable Data Vault

field.name: isLocked
field.description: Indicates a facility location is locked for reservations or not

field.name: parentTypeId
field.description: This will act as parent return reason Id.

field.name: shippingZone
field.description: Not used zone keyword since it's showing warning on console as RESERVED KEYWORD.

field.name: sendServiceName
field.description: Override for SystemMessageType.sendServiceName

field.name: username
field.description: Username for basic auth when sending to the remote system. This user needs permission to run the remote service or whatever on the remote system receives the message.

field.name: currentPassword
field.description: Username for basic auth when sending to the remote system.

field.name: publicKey
field.description: Public Key for key based authentication, generally RSA PEM format

field.name: privateKey
field.description: Private Key for key based authentication, generally RSA PEM PKCS #8 format like OpenSSH

field.name: remotePublicKey
field.description: Remote System's Public Key for decryption, signature validation, etc; generally RSA PEM or X.509 Certificate format

field.name: sharedSecret
field.description: Shared secret for auth on receive and/or sign on send.

field.name: sendSharedSecret
field.description: Shared secret for auth on send if different from secret used to authorize on receive.

field.name: sendAuthEnumId
field.description: If send and receive auth mechanisms are different specify send auth method here

field.name: systemMessageTypeId
field.description: Optional. May be used when this remote is for one type of message.

field.name: internalId
field.description: Sender (outgoing) or receiver (incoming) ID (EDI: in ISA06/08; OAGIS in ApplicationArea.Sender/Receiver.ID)

field.name: internalAppCode
field.description: Application code (EDI: in GS02/03; OAGIS: in ApplicationArea.Sender/Receiver elements, split among sub-elements)

field.name: remoteId
field.description: Sender (incoming) or receiver (outgoing) ID (EDI: in ISA06/08; OAGIS in ApplicationArea.Sender/Receiver.ID)

field.name: remoteAppCode
field.description: Application code (EDI: in GS02/03; OAGIS: in ApplicationArea.Sender/Receiver elements, split among sub-elements)

field.name: ackRequested
field.description: Request acknowledgement? Possible values dependent on message standard.

field.name: usageCode
field.description: Used for production versus test/etc. Possible values dependent on message standard.

field.name: produceServiceName
field.description: Not used in automated processing, but useful for documentation and tools in some cases.

field.name: receivePath
field.description: Where to look for files on a remote server, syntax is implementation specific

field.name: receiveFilePattern
field.description: Regular expression to match filenames in receivePath (optional)

field.name: receiveMovePath
field.description: After successful receive move file to this path if receiveResponseEnumId = MsgRrMove

field.name: sendPath
field.description: Where to put files on a remote server, syntax is implementation specific and may include both path and a filename pattern

entity.description: The entity will store mapping which will be used during import to map field with external system fields.
